website_summaries.verdict: Reusable acrylic tumblers are practical party favors guests will enjoy taking home.
pros: Double-walled tumblers insulate both cold and hot beverages
Multiple colors included, good for color-coding
Uses a sturdier screw top lid with straw holder
Smaller diameter is easier to hold during parties
cons: Straw and lid colors may not match exactly

customer_reviews.title: Need matching straws!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I was really afraid to order these cups but I took a chance. Thankfully they weren't broken or anything. They were wrapped very well! The only thing was that a couple of the straws weren't the same color as the cups! That small detail made a difference as I was giving these cups as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Bodden

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Weird colors.
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be pretty good quality but I got some pretty ugly colors. I got a few brown and gray tops. Who wants that? I ordered them for a kids party so I was expecting the bright colors that seem to be in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Robin K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for favors!
customer_reviews.text: These cups are awesome! I recently purchased them for a bachelorette party since I have one of the machines that cuts out vinyl. They were a huge hit! I will definitely be buying more for the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Buy them; you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.text: Between having cats and not having full depth perception I NEED lids on my drinks. I have bought tumblers many times throughout the years, but they all had problems. I ordered these, hoping they would be "okay". They aren't "okay", they are fabulous!! The colors are gorgeous, the tumblers are very sturdy, high quality, and the lids screw on perfectly, never catching or being misaligned. I also love having the brush for cleaning the straws. Based on my experience so far I anticipate having these for many years!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for board game nights
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for use when I host board game nights at my place. Obviously due to the nature of cardboard, I needed some tumblers that had to fit several criteria, namely: 1. Screw on lid - no accidental tops popping off if knocked over 2. Lid seals with a rubber washer 3. Straws cannot be removed once inserted correctly, providing more protection against escaping liquid 4. Double-walled to reduce condensation effects 5. Different colors for easier player recognition My only complaint is that at only 16oz, they do not hold a lot of liquid, especially when using ice, so refills are a constant issue. Would be much better if they came in a 32oz size.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !
customer_reviews.text: I just got these today ! I love them !!!!!! I make smoothies everyday , these are the perfect size . We also live on the lake and entertain large groups , the free straw cleaner is a nice bonus & the name tags keeps from “which one is mine ? “ helps tremendously. I recommend them and they are exactly what I was looking for !
customer_reviews.author: Anne Bonwell

customer_reviews.title: Cute well made cups
customer_reviews.text: These are great cups for kids or maybe even as a cup/party favor for a party. They come with cute dry erase "Hello my name is" labels that match their corresponding color lid and straw. The cups are well made and so far have been pretty darn durable. I put them in the dishwasher and have held up well there too so far. They do sweat when filled with ice, so coasters are still necessary. These cups were exceptionally well packed. They could have been Waterford crystal with how well they were packed. My shipment came promptly and accurately.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaLReviews

customer_reviews.title: Cute cups for a great value
customer_reviews.text: These tumblers were an excellent deal even though we didn't need 12 we bought anyways and my son was able to give a few to his friends who also loved them. So far they are very easy to clean and to hold for my littles with small hands. I noticed no leaking even with them being tossed around a bit, I am hopeful they will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: J L Harris

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and Practical Tumblers
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write a review to see if they survived a few dishwasher evolutions first, and so far they have. They do provide some insulation to keep drinks cold, but we're not talking Yeti quality by any means. I do not put the straws in the dishwasher, but do use the straw scrubber it comes with. I mostly drink ice coffee or chuhai in these and they are enjoyable and convenient to use. I look forward to breaking these out at a party and my wife likes to provide them to all the kiddos who come over to the house with beverages in these - the kids really seem to enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Cambo

customer_reviews.title: Love these skinny tumblers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these skinny tumblers to dress up as part of my grandson's end of year teacher gifts. Being in middle school, he has a total of 10 teachers and aides and I didn't want to leave anyone out. I added some summery looking decals and put he tumblers in a clear gift bag with a beach ball, funky sunglasses and a few little things. They turned out great! The different colors worked out well because each teacher has a different color. I have a few of these skinny tumblers myself that I use for my water everyday. They don't take up a lot of space on my desk and are easy for my small hands to grip.
customer_reviews.author: Nonna of 6

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Smoothie Prep for the Week
customer_reviews.text: I am far from a morning person so breakfast is not a thing for me. In an attempt to be more healthy, I purchased these to hold smoothies for a grab and go. I meal prep them each week and refrigerator all the tumblers. They make for a quick grab and go where I don't have to think. Perfect size in regards to portion amount, keep the contents cold, and spill-proof. A quick rinse in the sink and into the dishwasher and ready for the following week!
customer_reviews.author: Bretton

customer_reviews.title: Great to personalize with vinyl!
customer_reviews.text: These skinny tumblers work great with vinyl! Easy to personalized and make a great affordable gift! The girls who got these, were very happy! The colors are bright and with the matching color straw they make them stand out for sure! I just wish I can buy them by color but you can’t! 12 of them come in a box and they’re different/similar colors. There’s like 2 tones of red, green, orange, blue etc. Overall very happy with the tumblers and they arrived intact!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Repeat Customer
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my son's birthday party to use for party favors/name cards. They held up well and kept drinks from spilling. We bought more for Thanksgiving this year, to use as party favors/name cards. We have a large group for Thanksgiving. It's a great gift for them to take home and eliminates dirty dishes. We kept a few after my son's birthday party and take them camping with us. We used them at baseball tournaments between games. Loaded them with ice and put a Gatorade in them to re-hydrate our players. I use them everyday to take to work for my lemon ice water. Again, well built easy to hold, leak proof. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable Price!
customer_reviews.text: I had been searching for an affordable option for tumblers to make for my guests at a destination wedding - and had pretty much given up until I came across these. Very affordable, I can use my vinyl machine to personalize, and even if I run out of time for that they came with adorable adhesive name tags for the cups. They’re appearance is just as pictured, and they were packaged really well to prevent breaking during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Hard to reach into; small adult hands can clean
customer_reviews.text: Cups are 'hand wash only' but I put into washing machine for first wash and they are okay. They are easier to hold and keep ice cold longer. Little condensation so makes coasters redundant. Very durable and fun. I use disposable straws (evil, I know.) because I worry I won't clean the straw well enough or they will develop mold. there should be a stand made for dishwashers to clean reusable straws. would be a simple design
customer_reviews.author: consumerzon

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Pick these up for my team at work as a thank you for all the hard work they have been putting in. It was a big hit and I’m very pleased with my purchase. They was very well packaged and the colors were more vibrant than I thought they’d be. Overall, pleased with the product and very much worth the money. They actually arrived sooner than I planned. Plus the company followed up with me to ensure that I was completely satisfied. Very good experience and would recommend this company in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jenwilson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tumblers!
customer_reviews.text: We use a ton of tumblers in our house so I went on a hunt for some and these turned out to be a great purchase! I love the different colors and the cute little "stickers" that go on them. They are the perfect size for what I wanted. They fit great in all my cup holders. Not sure if they are leak proof as I haven't knocked one over yet but they do seem to have a pretty tight seal around the top. They were exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: SUZY

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this set for our kids for stocking stuffers. I received them in a timely manner. I really appreciated the 'Thank you' card; it's not often that a customer gets that personal touch anymore. I love the vibrant colors. There were 4 bottles that did not have matching straws (not a huge deal as they're still functional but aesthetically disappointing). The teens loved them! We use this type of bottle often and I'm excited to see how long they hold up. I would definitely purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: *3 J's momma

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: When I decided, less than a week before a camping trip, that my child and her cousins should have new fun cups...these were perfect. Shipping was fast, packaging was amazing, and the tumblers themselves are awesome. I'm glad I got more than I needed...because I'm going to need one too! (Note, they do all have matching straws, I just hadn't put them in for this picture.) The colors are great, the cups are quality, and they fit great in little or big hands (my youngest niece is 2). The adults were jealous.
customer_reviews.author: Kate McCaul

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: These tumblers are the best value! They are super cute and a thicker plastic than some of the others you can find at this price. They also come in a variety of colors with matching straws and name tags. I do wish there was a straw cleaner for each cup so when giving as gifts, they could go along with it. I gave these as baby shower party favors and they were a huge hit.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love these cups! Fun colors and the straws all match, or you can mix them up for more fun. I love that they are skinny, I have issues with other cups not fitting my car cup holder but these definitely will. I personalize cups and these will be perfect for orders and gifts. Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: amber davis

customer_reviews.title: The colors are vibrant and really pretty, very well made and packaged so nicely!! Thank you
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice tumblers, I love the slender look, the colors are really very bright and beautiful. I bought them to use for gifts. I plan to personalize them with vinyl and tie a coordinating ribbon on top around the straw and fill them with candy or something else small and pretty. You won’t be disappointed when you open these up! I promise, when I opened the box it just made me smile, they were so lovely! Thank you Tim and Steph keep up the great work! I look forward to ordering more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Tall and thin, fits into cupboard nicely.
customer_reviews.text: This product is quality made, and the lid isn't leaky. The design of the tumbler is unique and is rather attractive. I bought these for a garden party, and have decided to use these for sure. The sides of the tumbler don't sweat because of the double wall and keep drinks cool for a long time. They also have a wide color variety, no two colors are the same, along with matching straws. LOVE these tumblers. These tumblers are also easy to clean and fill easily. If I need more tumblers, I will be buying from this brand again. To sum it up, this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in perfect condition; not a complete match of straws to tumblers
customer_reviews.text: We used these tumblers as gifts. I bought four sets and every single one arrived in perfect condition due to the care the seller puts into their packaging. I love all the colors, but the straws didn't match perfectly. We managed to find a close enough color match for 47 of the 48, with the last one a deep red bottle with a green straw (it looked like an apple😊). Not leak-proof, but I didn't expect them to be. I wish I could put half stars. 4/5 stars for the straws not matching.
customer_reviews.author: Z. RODRIGUEZ

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with these tumblers. I had purchased some cheaper ones at a local store but ended up having to throw them away for various reasons. I ordered these very last minute and couldn't be happier with them. I personalized them for a family vacation and they came out great. I loved how they were so neatly and securely packaged and individually wrapped. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a favorite
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these 1st. Loved the different colors. I believe in just 3 weeks I've order the skinny tumblers 3 times. If you are going to make snowglobe tumblers dont use thick glitter, not enough room but the fine glitter looks nice it it. Overall I'm very pleased with these. Will order again
customer_reviews.author: Gar.cry

customer_reviews.title: Great product and packaging was awesome!! Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Omg these are so cute and perfect for my Grands 💚💙💜. Love the colors and the shape for their little but growing hands. I am so surprised with the packaging of these tumblers. The way they were wrapped you would've thought they were breakable or glass. Awesome! Looking forward to using these in place of sippy cups.
customer_reviews.author: TheGrandsMa

customer_reviews.title: I love this style!
customer_reviews.text: These tumblers were a good purchase! I am used to buying the standard double wall cups the curve our towards the top but I decided to try something a little different this time and dont regret it for a moment! I use these for give aways at our church and our logo fits so much more nicely on here as well as papers fitting well in them too!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have had them for a week and I’m just now getting a chance to open them, and I want to say first I’m in live with this product! The quality is great and I’m so glad I ordered these to add to my craft creations. I appreciate the thank you card inside, makes me feel like you really appreciate my business and that alone will keep me ordering another and another. I am a sharing a picture of me holding one one, but as soon as I design one I will write another review. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica M.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: These are great tumblers and the lid colors are great. Every color looks nice. I used them as party favors and filled them up treats and other smaller favors. Would highly recommend them. The little "My name is" stickers are also awesome. If you make a mistake when putting them on don't worry, you can peel them off and put them back on, no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Gosia G

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Cups and Great packaging
customer_reviews.text: These are the cutest cups and so many colors to choose from. Plan to add some decals and the double wall will help to keep them in place. Great for little hands as they are skinny but perfect size for adult drinks as well. The packaging was awesome. I would recommend. I have not used them yet just out of the box and filled one to sample its leaking. Obviously there is a straw hole so don't tip it. Will update with pic after application.
customer_reviews.author: Debra J.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Fun cups for outdoors.
customer_reviews.text: We just bought a house with a pool and we people over all the time. I was concerned about glass around the pool so these are GREAT for having drinks around the pool that won’t spill either. We tried them out and they are great. They come with reusable straws too.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Y

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, at a fantastic price!
customer_reviews.text: These are top quality and fantastic! Was worried they would feel cheap and brittle, but they are far from that! Bought them as party favors for my kids birthday party, and made vinyl stickers the kids could use to decorate, all the parents were impressed and everyone loved them! Will be finding reasons to buy more soon!
customer_reviews.author: River

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cups!
customer_reviews.text: I love these tumblers. My kids like having cups with kids, but they have outgrown sippy cups by several years. These are great. They aren't leak proof, but the spillage would be minimal if you knocked it over and picked it up right away. They also came with a brush to clean the straws which is very convenient. I really have nothing bad to say about them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Colorful, great for kids, adults and parties.
customer_reviews.text: These are so perfect for hangouts with friends. (Especially if you have kids) everyone gets their own color, I don't have to worry about things spilling or getting knocked over or breaking. Love that it comes with the straw cleaner and I wish they were dishwasher safe but it doesn't take too much extra time to hand wash. Highly recommended! I use them almost everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine

customer_reviews.title: very good quality tumblers
customer_reviews.text: Love the tumblers, love the colors!! the straws are very durable and able to be cleaned with the enclosed brush. I bought 3 dozen and everyone really loves them. I gave these to my dancers as a Christmas present, they all thanked me and love them They will use them to keep hydrated when they dance I will buy more when needed, great presents
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: They are nice quality, I like them for drinking. The only thing I complain about is that they are not dishwasher safe. Also, the lids screw on, and if I fill it all the way up some smoothie gets stuck in the threading and can be pretty tough to clean out. Overall, pretty much what I needed and came packaged extremely well. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Hanna Kessler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent seller!!
customer_reviews.text: These were better than expected!! I had a special decal made through amberockstar on Etsy & filled my cups with goodies. The ladies loved them!! One of my friends has arthritis very bad and said the cup was excellent because she could hold it so well. The colors offer something for everyone. The seller was excellent when I had a slight dilemma, he went above & beyond. Would absolutely recommend & order again.
customer_reviews.author: lp1627

customer_reviews.title: Not seal proof
customer_reviews.text: After leaving cup in water, I found tiny openings causing cup to absorb water in and not let out.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Terrific gifts!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for our Library staff as we are all wearing masks against Covid - 19 and staying hydrated is difficult. These tumblers are the perfect size and the straw fits well under a mask! The colors are bright and vibrant. The matching straws and name tags are a nice touch. Everyone on staff was pleased with them. They are a bit of fun in an otherwise difficult situation.
customer_reviews.author: Greensburg Public Library

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my friends when they come over because they always dirty my dishes . Now they have there own designated cups . Their cute . We all like em . The brown colored one didn’t come with mine tho . It’s fine tho overall great expierience/buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love our skinny tumblers!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my family's beach vacation and personalized them using my Cricut. We all love our skinny tumblers! They're easy to hold and none of them leak. The one and only criticism I have is that the straw for the dark red lid doesn't match it super well, but other than that I think it's a great product and I'll definitely purchase again if I make more tumblers in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great colors, price, and quality!
customer_reviews.text: These tumblers are fantastic! I ordered these as party favors for our Jamaican wedding coming up in a couple of weeks. The colors are bright and vibrant. The price was right and the quality seems good as well. I also love that they are skinny and have lids with straws. I had read some comments that the straws didn't match that well. Some people are so picky. They look fine to me. Is it the end of the world if they aren't perfectly matched? I think not. I would definitely order these again if I have another event coming up. I think our wedding guests will love filling these up with their favorite fruity drink at the tiki bar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these cups to decorate & give away. They came quick. The box looked like it had been bounced around a bit so I wasn’t sure about the product, but I opened the box & happy to see each each cup had its own space. The box was divided with 12 individual places for each cup. They were also wrapped with 2 layers of bubble wrap. Even a cute little card in the box! Job well done!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great versatile cup!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these cups to use at school for our PBIS reward program. The kids love them. They use their cups for hot cocoa. They are wonderfully insulated to the touch. You can't even feel the hot temperature outside of the cup. This is important if using at school with students. They jostle each other in the hall or the cups get knocked off desks so far, no problems. If there is one thing that would be nice to have a couple more of, it would be the cleaning brush. They get lost or dropped on the floor. A backup, even for home, would be awesome. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and Functional
customer_reviews.text: With an attractive, crisp appearance, these easy to hold tumblers are nearly spill proof. The lid screws on and straw is centered which adds an extra guard against spillage. Awesome for “grab and run” as well as frail persons who have difficulty holding glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome teacher gifts
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these water bottles for my staff of 30 teachers. There was a variety of enough colors where everyone got their favorite color . I created labels for each teacher with the labels that came with the bottles. What I love most was it came with a small brush to clean the straws. I wish I would have thought of this sooner for back to school or teacher appreciation gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a Mother's Day party I am hoping to be able to have. My plan is to decorate/personalize them. I got these literally next day . They are nicer in person I can not wait to hand them out :)
customer_reviews.author: Audra

customer_reviews.title: Buy them! They’re worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely LOVE these tumblers! My special needs Daughter drinks her formula out of these, and they are perfect for her! You won’t find a better deal on quality tumblers, and so many of them!! Highly recommend!! Will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Fairbank

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a decent price
customer_reviews.text: Im am very happy with my order. These cups came very well wrapped and the box was nicely packed. No room for wiggle or damage. These colors are super fun, perfect for little ones. I love the fact they are double wall. Great for crafts n decals!
customer_reviews.author: lizette

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I loved them the colors were as shown, there was a bit of confusion about the brown ones because one looks more like a dark red. So there's a light pink a dark pink, dark red and brown. Other than that they were great. I bought them for some of my sabbath school kids and they loved them. I also bought the vinyl names separately but this package already came with some. Would have liked one pipe cleaner for each straw but I guess those can be bought separately. Overall great purchase, loved it and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these with an idea of something to do for our members for our monthly give away. We took the cups and customized/decorated them and they turned out great. The cups are very nice and well made as well as very well packaged for shipment. We will definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Brenner

customer_reviews.title: Tight fitting lid and straw
customer_reviews.text: Love these skinny tumblers. My daughters like cups with lids and straws and these are perfect. They are a bit of a challenge to clean, but I purchased a sponge with a handle so it works great! One of my daughters tipped hers over and very little milk spilled out of the straw hole. They are GREAT and I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Paige A  Anderson

customer_reviews.title: What sold me was the multicolored lids
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some insulated plastic glasses for my cottage for when company came, I have been using the red Solo cups be it was hard to keep track of whose cup was whose. And the cups left rings on the furniture from the condensation so I have been keeping an eye for insulated plastic glasses. When I saw the Strata Tumblers it piqued my interest and I read the other reviews. What sold me was the multicolored lids so when you have all the grand nieces and nephews at the cottage there will be more fights over which cup was their cup.
customer_reviews.author: Diana_060

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful! Perfect condition! Great colors. Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! I got a pack of 24 for my son’s 4th bday party for the favors. Filled them with lollipops and tied ribbon around them with a thank you tag. They look fantastic all the different colors. Everything arrived packaged so well, they all look perfect and straws to match and name labels. So happy with my purchase and excited to give them out at his party. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: balitobaygirl

customer_reviews.title: Great for young kids to hold and no spills!
customer_reviews.text: These look amazing! I also love how they are skinnier and taller, which makes it easier for my kids to hold. They also help prevent spills by the lid screwing on tightly. I also contacted customer service about this product and had a very quick reply. I highly recommend these!!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Klapp

customer_reviews.title: Don't miss this one
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to my employees as a thank you for staying on with the corona virus and deep cleaning for when we do open they loved them!!! Would highly recommend great value great price great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: pwalkr

customer_reviews.title: Great price but not durable
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time ordering. The first time didn’t go so well and a lot of them broke after minimal use. This time one came broken right out of the box. I was really hoping for a better outcome this time. They are visually pretty and lovely colors and have a solid screw on top. Please fix quality control and I may order again.
customer_reviews.author: Danikm

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and as pictured. One straw was missing when I opened the box but I contacted the company and they responded quickly. They are sending a replacement straw and gave me a 10% refund so I'm super happy with the customer service. The tumblers are gifts so I haven't used them but they look nice and are good size, pretty colors.
customer_reviews.author: jkhtopaz

customer_reviews.title: Great tumblers!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our grandchildren to have at our annual cousin camp. We had 10 grandchildren there and there was a different color for each one of them. They loved them! It was great as they used their own tumbler the whole time. I dropped one and it didn't break or chip or anything. Really loved these ... better than I expected and I definitely recommend them. Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Moo

customer_reviews.title: Great for gifting but only a 12oz cup
customer_reviews.text: Great product and price! However, I can only fit 12 oz’s in this cup, not 16 oz.
customer_reviews.author: The Waldens

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift for parties.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bottles for a group of friends for a luncheon Christmas party. I put a colored assortment of various candies in each one to make it look more festive. Everybody loved them. They were such a big hit that I bought more to take to a family Christmas party. They are very well made! I just love them and will probably buy again for another occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Cherylann1

customer_reviews.title: Great product for Grandkids
customer_reviews.text: I love the Skinny Tumblers for my grandchildren. Although they aren't leakproof since there is an opening for the straw, these tumblers minimize damage to carpets if the tumbler is dropped. The diameter is perfect for little hands. The tumblers are 16oz. I would love to find these in a smaller size for the toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Super Awesome Cups
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher and bought 2 packs(24) of these for one of my high school teams to personalize. They are awesome! The colors are vibrant and so much fun. Easy to hold and because they are slim they fit in bags, all drink holders and can be carried around easily. I got a wire straw cleaner for mine and cleaning has been really simple. No leaking. I also really liked the packaging and little note from the small business this comes from. It is so nice to know we are supporting small businesses even when shopping online!! That was one of the best parts. Thanks, I will buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: COURTNEY HUERTA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tumblers, even better customer service! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute..the colors are really vibrant and the customer service is AMAZING! I ordered the 12 skinny tumblers..shipping was fast.. 1 cup had a minor cosmetic area on the lid and since I'm personalizing them for gifts I contacted the company and they send me a replacement right away and they were extremely friendly! I would 100% buy from them again!!! Excellent products and service! I wish all companies handled customer service the way these people did. Thanks so much!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent seller!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent seller, packed very nicely with a Thank You card! The best thing is that each tumbler was individually bubble-wrapped - which protected all but 1 from breakage when the box was just thrown from about 5 ft away onto my porch by the delivery driver. The sellers amazing packaging definitely is the reason why more didn't break!!! Luckily, I truly only needed 11 for my family vacation!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Tutt

customer_reviews.title: Fun for parties!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a girl's weekend and they were a hit! Everyone chose a color and used them for their drinks all weekend. This way it was very easy for everyone to keep track of their drink. The name tags were fun and easy to remove for washing. Very sturdy cup, fun colors and your drink stays cold too!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tumblers
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the tumblers on Amazon due to positive reviews. They are an excellent size-easy to hold, the tops stay on great-yet good to drink out of without the straw. Comes with a straw cleaner which works fantastic and name tags for the tumblers. The packing of the tumblers were excellent and the best I have seen - individually wrapped in plastic with bubble wrap in a strong box with dividers for each glass. I would highly recommend these tumblers and look forward to using them in the years ahead!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth S.

customer_reviews.title: Good lookin cups...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tumblers to make Christmas gifts for all my nieces and nephews this year. The box came and each cup was individually wrapped and were separated by cardboard. The cups arrived undamaged and they look great! The colored lids are vibrant and bright. Can’t wait to get started on my new project. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Mason

customer_reviews.title: Great cups
customer_reviews.text: Used these Christmas night - they were great- no problem with guests remembering what cup was theirs, plenty of colors and just had to remember what color they were using- love that the straws match the color of the tops
customer_reviews.author: jm46

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tumblers but....
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute and everyone loves them! Please be sure to CHECK THEM as one of my tumbles had a squished bug on the inside wall of the cup!!!! I get it, it can happen but trying to get ahold of a live person at Amazon was rather difficult, I gave up so 1 cup down.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Quality tumblers, look no further
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled with my purchase! They were exactly what I had in mind and ordered. Excellent quality, beautifully packaged, fast shipping, reasonably priced and a lovely note accompanied my order. I filled each tumbler with candy and used them as goody bags for my daughter’s Sweet 16 birthday party. They were a huge hit. Thank you so much Tim and Steph!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: They Sweat
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and shape. I always buy the double wall because helps keep drinks cold and no sweat. These don’t keep as cold and the sweat a lot! Update: I bought the Insulated Neoprene Bottle Sleeves for 16-24 oz bottles. They fit these perfectly and keep the ice for twice as long!
customer_reviews.author: MySpouse

customer_reviews.title: No contact info
customer_reviews.text: I love the tumblers, they are fun, different and don’t sweat....all great. However, mine arrived with a broken straw. Also came with a lovely thank you note asking for a good review and, if anything was wrong to contact the company before writing a bad review. I wanted to call or email the company just asking for a straw replacement...NOWHERE is there any info as to how to contact company. Really?
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Not Dishwasher Safe Tumblers , wash with bottle brush.
customer_reviews.text: Skinny and easy to grip for my mum. Handwash only. I accidentally added one of the tumbler into the dishwasher to wash,unfortunately lid wasn't able to fit to use on the tumbler anymore cause it wouldn't fit. This was due to the dishwasher. It's best to handwash it with long bottle brushes.
customer_reviews.author: maggyjoh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and awesome team to work with
customer_reviews.text: I am not much into provide review for products and people, but i have to take few mins and word it out my experience. Very very good product, all tumbler's colors are so pretty, material is very good and quality is pretty nice. With product, the customer service is exceptional. I had ordered two boxes and only one straw out of all the bottles did not match. owner contacted me personally to check if I am satisfied with the product and when i mentioned this small issue, immediately they sent me straws with all the colors. I did tell them specific color straw missing, but they sent all the colors straws.
customer_reviews.author: Real Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I have not used these cups yet but I did enjoy that they came quickly and the colors are beautiful. They look exactly like the picture and I'm waiting to use them once they are professionally labeled.
customer_reviews.author: brittbee

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these for their value.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my entire kitchen at the restaurant I work at. As a server I hear them complain a lot about their hot water in flimsy plastic cups. It felt like Christmas everyone getting to pick their own color which was fun. They don't maintain ice as long as I would have hoped, but it is 90+ degrees behind the line at any given time. They still do well despite that and usually refilled before it matters. 10/10 value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Cups
customer_reviews.text: The cups are well designed and the colors are very nice, the straws match the cups perfectly. Love the reusable name tags and the fact that there is a straw cleaner that comes with the order. They come packaged with care. We will enjoy these for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Practical
customer_reviews.text: I wanted some cups for children at our Thanksgiving party. They run around a lot so I wanted something that would not spill. These are really pretty! And they will keep drinks cold (or hot)! So, perfect for my occasion!
customer_reviews.author: Sybilsadie

customer_reviews.title: The easiest tumblers to use!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these tumblers!! They fit perfectly in the cup holders of our cars, and are easy to slide into a beach bag when we are headed there. Just sent 4 of them to a friend who has a cottage on Owasco Lake in New York State. They will be perfect for them to use on their boat! The only caution from me would be to remember that they must be hand washed. Wouldn't want to see the beautiful colors damaged in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: No sweating!
customer_reviews.text: These beautiful little tumblers are wonderful. They do no sweat -- no need for coasters! They are easy for arthritic and small (kids) hands to hold. Plus, they are pretty :-) Giving to my grands filled with goodies for Christmas gifts. Very pleased with this purchase, and would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best style and design and quality for 4+
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for six yr old birthday Fabulous design No leaks or spills these cups were NOT favors at the party but kids loved them and I did see adults sneaking out with them too! I’m ordering another set. Quality is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: AliciaMom

customer_reviews.title: Loved them
customer_reviews.text: I got these to give as favors, they came nicely packed, not a single scratch on any. They are quite easy to clean, although I washed them by hand and not in the dishwasher just to be safe. They are a good size and I think they could hold and entire water bottle (16onz) although we used these for cold beverages through the weekend. One thing to watch out for is they are not leak proof so if the tumblers are full and you move them be mindful of liquid that may drip from the straw hole
customer_reviews.author: Osairis Guzman

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT, love the color coordination and they really keep drinks colder longer and do not leak. DO NOT put them in the dishwasher they are HAND WASH only. I made the mistake forgetting about this and almost half of them are warped at the threading on the tumbler so the lids do not work. This is my fault, it was clearly marked hand wash only. I will buy again to replace my disfigured ones later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate the quality of this product. I use them to help make a little side hobby money out of craft vinyl projects and they are great quality to sell to friends and family once fully customized. They hold ahesives well and are very good quality for washing and prolonged use. Not to bad of a price for what you recieve but wish i could find whole sale prices in the future if i were to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Hockensmith

customer_reviews.title: Just about perfect
customer_reviews.text: These cups are definitely high-quality double-walled. I couldn't even feel that my drink was ice-cold while holding it. The only thing that might garner a negative is the straws are a little cheap looking in comparison to the cups, like the color didn't take as well as it could have when they were color-matching to the lids, but they don't feel weird and work just fine, so it's definitely not worth removing a star. Just something to mention as a heads up. I'd buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Party Favor!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make favors for my son’s Halloween-themed 5th birthday party in June! I wanted something useful with a way to make it match the theme. The colors were all different and beautiful. The kids all got to choose a pretty color without being stuck with a weird, ugly shade. We didn’t actually use them, so I can’t speak to their function, but they seem pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great Group gifts
customer_reviews.text: Great quality at a low price. Ordered these for office Christmas gifts and stuffed them with goodies. Everyone enjoyed their gifts and I was glad I had kept one for myself. Good size, nice colorful lids, and sturdy reusable straw. The only warning I would give is that they are hand wash only.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: These Are Awesome! So Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE! Im using them for water and fresh made juices. They stay cool and I haven't had one condensation problem on my desk! I've designated one to each of my children and no breakage. I do handwash them to keep nice. The included straw cleaner is a must for juicing! Seems silly to rave about cups! But I nearly didn't purchase these because of the price. Super worth it.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep beverages hot or cold very long
customer_reviews.text: They do not keep liquids hot are cold. Ice melts within 1 hour and hot beverages cool off in less than a hour. We brought them to use like travel glasses but they are inadequate for that purpose. The slim style is the primary reason we purchased them Stainless steel mugs out perform your glasses head over heels. We would like to return your glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Walpole

customer_reviews.title: Love then- we drink soooo much more than water now Andy 3 year old loves them.
customer_reviews.text: I love them My husband loves them My 3 year Olden loves Then We love them so much that they’re almost all missing because we’re always grabbing a nice to go cup of ice water with these and I will happily buy again every time they start to disappear (they always do) Anyway happily buying another box today Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Ebony

customer_reviews.title: Love these!! Great for gifts
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my coworkers and saved one for myself. They said they loved them! The thing I love the most is they don’t condensate on the outside no matter how cold the drink is. It’s also very sleek. Comes with a straw cleaner. BPA free
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors
customer_reviews.text: Because they are skinny they are easy to hold. Down side is they are too small to get my hand in to wash. I am sharing the 12 pack with my daughter who will be moving into a new house with a beautiful screened porch. Perfect for outside entertaining. All in all, I am very happy with the purchase of the 12 skinny acrylic tumblers.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Diak

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these tumblers!!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted some new travel cups for my daughters (4&6) that weren't sippy cups or a thermos. Found these and we absolutely love them! Tall enough to hold plenty of water but thin enough for my daughters to carry them. They came individually wrapped and packed well in their box. Ordered them a month and a half ago. I handwash them and they are in perfect condition 6 weeks into using. Would definitely recommend!! I haven't used the straws yet....we had silicone ones that we have been using.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Wide variety of colors
customer_reviews.text: I believe i already left a review, but I used them for end of year student gifts and filled them with assorted candy. The kids can use them as water bottles or whatever they choose. They picked the color they liked. the tags allowed me to write a message to each student. they loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wedding favors
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a fun wedding favor for the kidos. Not only are they fun but also classy looking and have a lid to help prevent spills. The fun colors help the children identify who's is who's keeps their drinks cold and they get to bring it home win-win-win so happy that I purchased these.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Ann Romo

customer_reviews.title: Great for gifts!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these cups for my work team and I wasn't really sure what to expect. But after receiving them, I was extremely surprised to see that they are sturdy, they come in really beautiful colors, and are packed securely. I'm just surprised that I got all these great tumblers for the low price. I'll definitely be buying again for other occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Julia S

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: I ordered colored tumblers and I received clear! Very false advertising!!
customer_reviews.author: Melonie Radlinski

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These bottles were perfect for our vinyl transfer. High quality. The only reason it’s not 5 stars all around is because I was asked if they are leak proof. They aren’t because of the straw. But I never expected them to be leak proof. Met my high expectations
customer_reviews.author: Kris M Cannata

product_meta.title: SKINNY TUMBLERS 12 Colored Acrylic Tumblers with Lids and Straws | Skinny, 16oz Double Wall Clear Plastic Tumblers With FREE Straw Cleaner & Name Tags! Reusable Cup With Straw (Multicolors, 12)
feature_bullets: ✅ONE DAY SALE??COLD DRINKS STAY COLD! And warm drinks stay warm! Forget about single-walled tumblers. Sure, they can hold a drink, but sooner or later you’ll wish that cold drink hadn’t gone warm, or left condensation rings all over your surface. Strata Tumblers with their double walls, thermo-regulate your drinks so you can enjoy them down to the last refreshing drop.

✅12 FUN PARTY COLORS: Got 12 kids? No? You will when you bring these out at parties. Watch how even the most serious adult eyeballs their favorite color, hoping that someone else doesn’t grab it first. Obviously color-coding is a great way to stop someone stealing your drink, and a must-have for allergy sufferers.

✅SPLASH-PROOF LIDS: Most acrylic tumblers come with a rubber push down lid, and when you drop them the lid pops off. Strata Tumblers come with colored screw top lids with tight straw seal. While we can’t say a few drops won’t escape, we can say you won’t be cleaning up a giant orange juice mess from your carpet.

✅EASY TO CLEAN: Cracked plastic and water getting into the double walls are real concerns when it comes to cleaning an acrylic tumbler. So our design team solved both problems. Your tumblers are 100% Handwash Only. They also come with a BONUS REUSABLE VINYL NAME TAGS & STRAW CLEANER so you can keep straws free from mold and bacteria.

✅SATISFYING TO GRIP: Many people agree skinny tumblers are the most comfortable size to hold. Not only do they feel good, they’re easier for kids, and folks with arthritic hands. Each tumbler is 8.5” high with a 2.5” diameter, and holds 16oz of your favorite beverage. BPA FREE, Non-Toxic.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars2,862 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
